meaning: Able to withstand or recover quickly from difficult conditions.
example1: The community was highly resilient after the storm.
example2: She has a resilient spirit that keeps her going.

meaning: Lucky in making unexpected and fortunate discoveries.
example1: The way this house came to us was sort of serendipitous, but not without a few hiccups of course, haha!.
example2: On the hottest weekend of the year in Southern California, the team had a serendipitous evening start time.

meaning: Dealing with problems in a practical way rather than by following ideas or principles.
hindi_meaning: व्‍यावहारिक, यथार्थवादी (न कि सिद्घांतवादी या कल्‍पनाशील)
example1: A pragmatic solution may not be the best one in the long term.
example2: This is a programme that any pragmatic centre-right government could be proud of.

meaning: (ideas, thoughts, etc.) clear and easy to understand; logical.
example1: She was lucid and coherent and did not appear to be injured.
example2: I fail to see how that provides a logical, coherent argument for the increase.

hindi_meaning: विवेक, समझदारी, तमीज़, प्रभेद, या भेद करने की क्षमता
example1: His lack of discernment led to his disastrous choice of business partners.
example2: Money, art and careers depend on the discernment, if not the kindness, of strangers.
